text: I wonder if @PierrePoilievre includes women's rights to make decisions in regards to their own bodies as having "control" of their lives. 🤨 It appears that some members of the conservative party still believe they should be able to decide what a woman is or is not allowed to do. https://t.co/h1dS7HMcrX

text:
LB, on our way to get ice cream after school: IT'S HALLOWEEN!! 👻🎃

... while I enjoy,  and appreciate, the enthusiasm - can we enjoy summer first please? 😅☀️

text: LB got off the school bus today and immediately told me I was his best friend forever. 😍 Here's hoping he remembers this in 10-ish years. 😅

author: PS 🌻🖤
text:
Conversations with LB -

Me: I’m going to put a movie on for us to watch.
LB: Paw Patrol?
Me: Nooo. A movie that I want to watch too. 
LB: Not a cooking show! 

Thanks kid, I get it - I’m boring. 🙄😂
